description.narrative: 1)Preservation of employment in frontier region of the country: Combined Superfilm and Sanko Tekstil have around 6,000 employees most of which work in the frontier regions of Turkey. The increased capacity at Superfilm and Sanko Tekstil will enable the Borrowers to be more competitive and retain the existing work-force. 2)Exports: Superfilm and Sanko Tekstil are exporters. The investments will enable them to improve their standings in the export markets and help increase export activity and hard currency inflows into Turkey. 3)Environmental Benefits: New machines will be more energy-efficient which will increase overall energy efficiency of Superfilm and Sanko Tekstil.

The Project is related to the investment programs of Sanko Holdings two subsidiaries. Superfilm is a manufacturer of packaging film, while Sanko Tekstil is a vertically-integrated textile operation. The Project includes proposed investment by Superfilm in new production lines which will increase capacity and expand its product mix, and by Sanko Tekstil which will increase the production capacity in Gaziantep and Corlu facilities.
